attributes.comment:
I appreciate the right to comment on the proposed fee increases. I think they are outrageously high
and generate very little benefit. If, before the fees are implemented, efficiency is only expected to
improve 20%, it will almost certainly not even get to 15%, a paltry change in a ridiculously
beaurocratic system.

Whether or not these fee increases are intended to purposely prevent immigrants from coming to
this country and/or becoming citizens once they are here, that will certainly be the end result.
People new to this country must struggle to get by, often making as little as $15,000 per year,
which certainly doesn't leave much after food, rent, car and gasolline costs. If your intent is to
make even more illegal aliens out of originally legal aliens, then pass your obscene rate hike.
Otherwise, perhaps you could work on streamlining decision making processes and other
symptoms of a beaurocracy gone wild.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Nancy Pottish
